title: How to Make Crunchy Chickpea and Nut Slaw

steps.headline: Mix all of the ingredients in a large bowl (except for the bread).
Serve.
steps.description: Place the bowl in the middle of the table with serving implements. Provide the bread for eating with the salad.

text: Mix all of the ingredients in a large bowl (except for the bread).  Mix in the walnut oil.  Drizzle over with yoghurt.  Serve. Place the bowl in the middle of the table with serving implements. Provide the bread for eating with the salad. Finished.
